data.message: God put humans on earth to populate...gays cant populate....god created adam an eve..not steve an john...or sarah an kim....hell bound..

replies.message: Trust me, with a world population of 7 billion, we don't need any help there.
Hey loads of strait people populate this planet with kids they dont want. They jusy spread their legs and dump their kids on society.  So your argument is invalid.
Amen i agree with Tito.
Well Tito is an idiot. Thinking of himself, not the whole of society.

Tito - Please explain the thousands of straight people who can't have kids.  Or the ones who choose not to?  They don't belong here either?  Really?  How is LOVE so offensive to everyone?  I don't get it!
Christians are such hypocrites. Their bible says gay is a sin, and yet they support it.. -A christian that hates gays talking-

You know, leviticus also states that christians aren't allowed to eat port or wear two different kinds of fabrics at the same time. They're equally as sinful as homosexuality. So guess where you're going when you die!
Pmsl
There's also millions of homeless and unloved children that no straight couple wants to adopt. How about a nice gay couple giving them happiness.
Just because gays can't reproduce doesn't mean they're going against nature. It just makes them more responsible and appreciative of bringing another life into their family.
with that logic, we should kill the elderly and sterile people in the world
I just get sick of those who use "God" as an excuse to protest against gay marriage
a lot of married straight couples dont have kids, so i guess they are doing it wrong. guess they shouldnt be allowed to marry.

1 Corinthians 2:14
New King James Version (NKJV)
14 But the natural man does not receive the things of the Spirit of God, for they are foolishness to him; nor can he know them, because they are spiritually discerned.

The end time is here.
well blame the heterosexual's for all the gay babies

Tito you are literally the dumbest life form I have seen today. and in this comment section that's really saying something.

love isn't about populating and breeding

Cause the world isn't over populated enough with starving,  unwanted children brought here by straight couples. At least gay couples have the opportunity to clean up the mess straight people have created spitting out kids left and right with no regard to the future population and environment.
Male gay people cannot become pregnant.  Male straight people cannot become pregnant.  No difference.  Maybe Tito Byrd should review sex education.
The world is currently OVER-populated if you weren't aware...... you are just wayyyy tooo smart
u need to look around us gays r not hurting u if u don't like it then that's not our fault its yours
Only God can say who's going to hell or who's not. It's not yours to judge.
